description: man walking in street, wearing a bikini with beads hanging from the trunks and wearing beads around his neck, with metallic body paint; man at R wearing a bird mask, g-string and shiny arm coverings; other men on curb at L in background

title: Mardi Gras, New Orleans, LA, from "Night" series
